    • Method Detail

      • checkLimit

        public void checkLimit()
                throws LimitException
        Description copied from class: LimitService
        Estimate the resources used by this request and throw a LimitException if these exceed a reasonable value for an interactive page. In practice this will be the time since the start of the request and the increase of global memory consumption since the start of the request
        Specified by:
        checkLimit in class LimitService
        Throws:
        LimitException
